title: Floral Watch Face
summary: Floral is a watch face inspired by old historical botanical drawings.
description: Floral is a watch face designed for Android Wear. The design is inspired by old historical botanical drawings. Floral comes in three color and can be used in a 12 hour or 24 hour format. If you have experienced any problems or have suggestions for the watch face, feel free to send us an email and we will be happy to respond promptly.Supports wear devices including:Moto 360, LG G, LG G R, Sony Smartwatch 3, LG Urbane, Asus Zenwatch, Gear Live
descriptionHTML:
Floral is a watch face designed for Android Wear. The design is inspired by old historical botanical drawings. Floral comes in three color and can be used in a 12 hour or 24 hour format. If you have experienced any problems or have suggestions for the watch face, feel free to send us an email and we will be happy to respond promptly.

Supports wear devices including:
Moto 360, LG G, LG G R, Sony Smartwatch 3, LG Urbane, Asus Zenwatch, Gear Live
comments: Very pretty watch face but I have an issue where the background image seems to have moved left so that I have a similar 'flat tire' on the right of the screen as the bottom. I'm using 42mm moto 360.
Absolutely perfect. I could look at it all day
Can't work on Michael Kors Dylan :(
I love but wish it had the date on it as well.
Beautiful app. Nothing wrong with it.
